Item.sqlserver_body: CREATE UNIQUE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [UniqueIndex_unidr_Relationship] ON [innovator].[UNIDR_RELATIONSHIP] ( [DESTINATION_ID] ASC, [DR_RELATIONSHIP_ID] ASC, [DEPARTURE_ID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, DROP_EXISTING = OFF, ONLINE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
Item.name: UniqueIndex_unidr_Relationship
